1.name: Skill Enhancement
1.description:
1 level to 3 different non-{Defense} skills, if you do not yet have them.

1 level to 2 different {Defense} skills, one of which picked by the player.

2.name: Skill Enhancement
2.description:
1 level to 3 different non-{Defense} skills.

1 level to 2 different {Defense} skills of the player's choice.
